wikipedia_page.main: Sam Patterson (born 29 October 1993) is an English former footballer who played as a right back or midfielder.

response: Sam Patterson was an American football coach. He was the second head football coach at Southern Illinois Normal College—now known as Southern Illinois University Carbondale—serving for one season, in 1917, and compiling a record of 2–2.
